subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- World Bank President Paul Wolfowitz to resign at the end of June, bank directors announced in a written statement.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

Do you really know what you're eating? This weekend on an all
new CNN Special Investigations Unit, Dr. Sanjay Gupta uncovers
the truth about tainted food entering the U.S. food supply.
Don't miss "Danger: Poisoned Food," this Saturday and Sunday
8 p.m. ET.  http://www.cnn.com/poisonedfood
